name: Death Day
description:
Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • E to interact
  • Mouse Scroll to choose the active item
  • Mouse Left Click to skip text

Description

A man comes to a remote cabin in the woods to fix it up for his family. However, there is a new monstrous resident which drags him into a sadistic loop of death. The only way to break the cycle is to use everything you can find to defeat the beast. But time is of the essence, while you are stuck in a time loop of death, real world time passes. Will you slay the monster or will your family arrive and become his next victims?
